version_description: Re-enables Continue with Twitter functionality as part of ongoing security improvements. More information here: http://bit.ly/SecurityDetails
Bug fixes and usability enhancements
Bug fixes.

We rebuilt our iOS app from the ground up--redesigning the experience to match our #NewBitly brand, sunsetting outdated features, and focusing UX on Bitlink management.

With the new Bitly app for iOS, you can search and filter all of your Bitlinks, view detailed performance data, and edit or share directly from the app. You can now also shorten Bitlinks directly from other apps by simply copying a link and selecting Bitly from the share options.

We rebuilt our iOS app from the ground up--redesigning the experience to match our #NewBitly brand, sunsetting outdated features, and focusing UX on Bitlink management.

With the new Bitly app for iOS, you can search and filter all of your Bitlinks, view detailed performance data, and edit or share directly from the app. You can now also shorten Bitlinks directly from other apps by simply copying a link and selecting Bitly from the share options.
Bug fixes and other improvements.
Bug fixes and other improvements.

We've upgraded our app with new features so you can:
+ Share bitlinks seamlessly within iMessage.
+ 'Peek + pop' into the app to quickly create a bitlink or check your click stats.
+ Use the daily widget to get a glimpse of your top performing bitlinks without even opening the app.
On top of that we've fixed a few bugs, including one that makes it easier for you to update your links!

We've added two new features to the app to better optimize your links!

- Shareable reports: We've created easy reports for you to share click data, referrers, and locations for any Bitlink you create.
- Add tags to Bitlinks: Add and edit tags on your Bitlinks to quickly organize and filter them.

- Add tags to Bitlinks: Add and edit tags on your Bitlinks to quickly organize and filter them.

We've added two new features to the app to better optimize your links!

- Shareable reports: We've created easy reports for you to share click data, referrers, and locations for any Bitlink you create.
- Add tags to Bitlinks: Add and edit tags on your Bitlinks to quickly organize and filter them.

Also some of you may have experienced some downtime on your Bitly app - sorry for that! We had to polish up some things and now we are ready for action!

We’ve added support for Sign in with Apple. This release also contains bug fixes and general improvements.
We’ve updated our look. The new design provides you easier access to link shortening, while on the go. This release also contains general improvements & bug fixes.

* Performance improvements
* General updates for various issues and user support.
